<As I said, I wish to talk, Night Shade.>  Empath transforms and 
lands, old-school Decepticon style.  "I come on behalf of Lord 
Galvatron," she says aloud.  "My name is Empath.  I would like to 
offer you a position among our ranks."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "lady_night_shade04" <lady_night_shade04@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> Night shade looks up and sees the jet and smirks. <I was wondering 
> what that noise was. What do you want?>
